emulator_not_found_text:
Unfortunately, no valid folder structure could be detected in the specified directory.
Please check if you have installed the emulator correctly.
no_games_found_text: It seems you haven't added any games to your emulator yet.
no_games_found_hint_text:
Select the internal application folder of the emulator.
To find the folder click on "Open {emulatorName} folder" in the emulator menu.
